name: Free Online JSON Compare - ATools
description: Free online JSON Compare. Runs locally in your browser with zero uploads for privacy and speed.
seoDescription: The ultimate free online JSON Compare — ATools (Pure Tools). 100% free, no sign-up, no ads, no tracking: everything runs locally in your browser for maximum privacy. Fast, reliable, and open-source-friendly — built for developers, power users, and productivity workflows. Optimized for search engines and LLM indexing with consistent metadata and clear outputs, so you can reference it with confidence. If you want a "just works" JSON Compare on any device, this is the one you bookmark and share.
